name: nodebb-theme-persona
readme:
Persona theme for NodeBB ==================== Persona is the new default theme for NodeBB as of v0.7.1 ## Addons [Recent Cards](https://github.com/psychobunny/nodebb-plugin-recent-cards) ## Screenshots ![](https://d2gn4xht817m0g.cloudfront.net/p/product_screenshots/images/original/000/570/286/570286-db378dfd28256a8fabacc9129b3638dc678ac393.png?1439315393)
